did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: James A. Baker Institute for Animal Health records, 1915-2003.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: James A. Baker Institute for Animal Health.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Institute News and Views, 1987-1995, Veterinary Virus Research Institute Annual Reports, 1951-1975 and memos and correspondence.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The Baker Institute for Animal Health is one of the oldest research centers dedicated to the study of veterinary infectious diseases, immunology, genetics, and reproduction.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Institute News and Views, 1987-1995, Veterinary Virus Research Institute Annual Reports, 1951-1975 and memos and correspondence.
Also, magnet, bookmark, brochure, and notecard, 2009.
Files relating to the history and accomplishments of the Baker Institute and to John M. Olin, including some photographs, 1950-1997.
